Desc.entry: An organic community allotment including a small forest garden, poly-tunnel and raised beds. Managed by Tinsley Forum Tree Project group which organises weekly volunteer sessions to help with garden maintenance and the growing and harvesting of fruit and vegetables. Volunteers may be entitled to travel expenses.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Volunteer sessions are Fri 10am-12noon (Mar-Sep) or one Fri in the month (Oct-Feb), please contact for details
